text: Matthias Schoenaerts (; ; born 8 December 1977) is a Belgian actor, movie producer, and graffiti artist.Matthias Schoenarts on IMDB Schoenaerts is best known for his roles as Filip in Loft (2008), Jacky Vanmarsenille in the Oscar- nominated Bullhead (2011), Ali in the BAFTA and Golden Globe-nominee Rust and Bone (2012), Eric Deeds in The Drop (2014), Bruno von Falk in Suite Fran√ßaise (2015), Gabriel Oak in Far from the Madding Crowd (2015), Hans Axgil in The Danish Girl (2015) and Uncle Vanya in Red Sparrow (2018). He also starred as an ex-soldier suffering from PTSD in Disorder (2015), and as an inmate training a wild horse in The Mustang (2019). ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Matthias Schoenaerts at The-Numbers.com * Matthias Schoenaerts on 24 uur met * Interview for Interview magazine Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian movie actors Category:Belgian television actors Category:Belgian stage actors Category:Belgian voice actors Category:Belgian artists Category:Belgian movie producers Category:People from Antwerp
title: Matthias Schoenaerts
